rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Serves as the main entrance with a foyer, incorporating a small waiting area. The design ensures proper natural light and adherence to Vastu by having the main door aligned towards the North or East.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious lobby that connects to the garage and living areas. The layout allows for easy navigation with a focus on openness, consistent with modern design aesthetics.

rooms.name: Industrial Kitchen
rooms.description: A dedicated industrial-style kitchen designed for efficiency with ample storage space. Vastu is considered by positioning the kitchen in the southeast section to ensure energy balance.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, an open dining area that complements the industrial design and facilitates comfortable seating arrangements. The layout respects spatial flow as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A small guest room featuring efficient storage solutions, designed for occasional visitors. It is positioned in the northeast region to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A compact office space that can double as a study or work area, placed in the northwest section according to Vastu for concentration and productivity.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Serves as storage for cleaning supplies and other utilities. It is designed with practicality in mind while ensuring it does not disturb the overall flow of the living space.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large glass door leading from the foyer into the lobby. The main entrance is aligned per Vastu, preferably towards the North or East to invite positive energy.

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.description: A dedicated entry for two-car garage access, ensuring smooth vehicle movement and storage of vehicles.

openings.name: Sliding Patio Doors
openings.description: Large openings that lead to an external industrial-style patio, providing a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor living areas.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom designed with ample space for relaxation and privacy. It includes a walk-in closet, en-suite bathroom, and an adjoining terrace that offers a private outdoor retreat. Vastu principles are considered by positioning the master bedroom in the southwest area.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom for family members, featuring sufficient space and storage solutions. It is located in the northwest quadrant to foster calm energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: An additional bedroom designed to meet the needs of a growing family, with flexibility for multipurpose use such as home office or guest room. Placed in the southeast quadrant per Vastu.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Attached to the master bedroom, this bathroom is designed with modern fixtures and sufficient space for relaxation.

openings.name: Master Bedroom Balcony Door
openings.description: A door leading from the master bedroom to a private terrace, enhancing the living experience with outdoor access and natural light.

openings.name: Interior Staircase
openings.description: Provides seamless connectivity between ground and upper floors while maintaining privacy and functionality.

rooms.name: Master Suite
rooms.description: A luxurious suite for the primary occupant, featuring a large bedroom, an en-suite bathroom with premium finishes, and an adjoining living area. The design embraces industrial aesthetics while ensuring comfort and privacy, in line with Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Suite Balcony Door
openings.description: Provides access to an exclusive outdoor space designed for relaxation and entertainment.
